ttp_template:
<group name="abort_timer_agent_url_circuit_id_enabled">
DHCP snooping is {{ENABLED | ORPHRASE}}
{{VLAN_CONFIGURED | ORPHRASE}}
{{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
  circuit-id default format: {{CIRCUIT_ID | ORPHRASE}}
  remote-id default format: {{REMOTE_ID | ORPHRASE}}
  Agent URL : {{AGENT_URL | ORPHRASE}}
  Write delay Timer: {{WRITE_DELAY_TIMER | ORPHRASE}} seconds
</group>
cli_content:
Switch DHCP snooping configuration:
DHCP snooping is enabled
DHCP snooping is configured on following VLANs:
1,10-20
DHCP snooping is operational on following VLANs:
1,12
DHCP snooping is configured on the following Interfaces:
Associated interfaces: 
FastEthernet0/1
FastEthernet0/2
FastEthernet0/3
Insertion of option 82 is enabled
   circuit-id default format: vlan-mod-port
   remote-id default format: MAC
Option 82 on untrusted port is not allowed
Verification of relay agent IP address is enabled

DHCP snooping database configuration:
   Agent URL : tftp://192.168.0.1/snooping-database
   Write delay Timer: 300 seconds
   Abort Timer: 300 seconds
textfsm_template:
Value ENABLED (\S+)
Value VLAN_CONFIGURED ((\d+(,\d+-\d+)*))
Value VLAN_OPERATIONAL ((\d+(,\d+-\d+)*))
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value OPTION82_ENABLED (\S+)
Value CIRCUIT_ID (\S+)
Value REMOTE_ID (\S+)
Value OPTION82_UNTRUSTED_PORT (\S+)
Value VERIFICATION_RELAY_AGENT_IP (\S+)
Value AGENT_URL (\S+)
Value WRITE_DELAY_TIMER (\d+)
Value ABORT_TIMER (\d+)

Start
  ^DHCP\s+snooping\s+is\s+${ENABLED}\s*$$
  ^DHCP\s+snooping\s+is\s+configured\s+on\s+following\s+VLANs:\s*$$
  ^\s*${VLAN_CONFIGURED}\s*$$
  ^DHCP\s+snooping\s+is\s+operational\s+on\s+following\s+VLANs:\s*$$
  ^\s*${VLAN_OPERATIONAL}\s*$$
  ^DHCP\s+snooping\s+is\s+configured\s+on\s+the\s+following\s+Interfaces:\s*$$
  ^Associated\s+interfaces:\s*$$
  ^\s*${INTERFACE}\s*$$
  ^Insertion\s+of\s+option\s+82\s+is\s+${OPTION82_ENABLED}\s*$$
  ^\s+circuit-id\s+default\s+format:\s+${CIRCUIT_ID}\s*$$
  ^\s+remote-id\s+default\s+format:\s+${REMOTE_ID}\s*$$
  ^Option\s+82\s+on\s+untrusted\s+port\s+is\s+${OPTION82_UNTRUSTED_PORT}\s*$$
  ^Verification\s+of\s+relay\s+agent\s+IP\s+address\s+is\s+${VERIFICATION_RELAY_AGENT_IP}\s*$$
  ^DHCP\s+snooping\s+database\s+configuration:\s*$$
  ^\s+Agent\s+URL\s+:\s+${AGENT_URL}\s*$$
  ^\s+Write\s+delay\s+Timer:\s+${WRITE_DELAY_TIMER}\s+seconds\s*$$
  ^\s+Abort\s+Timer:\s+${ABORT_TIMER}\s+seconds\s*$$
